title: Dad's Army: The Complete Scripts
description: Published for the first time in one volume, these are the complete scripts of the greatest British sitcom of all time, Dad's Army. In all, nine series were made and are constantly repeated. Dad's Army: The Complete Scripts brings together all eighty of these episodes as well as exclusive contributions by the actors, writers, and producers of the series. This is undoubtedly TV situation comedy's finest hour.
author: Jimmy Perry
